rating_comment: Highly recommended, nice room and a walking distance to the beach. Everything you need just a phone call away. Hope you will enjoy your stay.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2021,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Highly Recommended . Got this Wonderful deal in a very Cheap Price . Mr.Arafat is a great Host. He was very communicative throughout my stay .

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2020,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
It’s a private room in a 4 star hotel, for the price it’s a phenomenal deal, the trims are cleaned everyday and towels, sheets and such changed . The room is very clean. Room service was always at call and adequate. There is a pool but it was dirty for 2 days among the 3 days I stayed , they don’t change the water often.
Other than the dirty pool and the mediocre breakfast the room was perfect clean and so was the toilet.
Arafat was very cooperative and responded quite quickly
